item.title: Linux
item.dc:creator: @Digital_Hotdogs Digital Hotdogs
item.description:
@Digital_Hotdogs wrote:

[quote=“slick, post:2, topic:15463”]yes sir, heres mine juss change path for compiler and run : )
my compile.sh:

/home/slick/Desktop/jdk1.6.0_11/bin/javac -cp . *.java

a note for the compiler: i have jdk as u can see!
my run.sh:

/home/slick/Desktop/jdk1.6.0_11/bin/java -Xm512M server

however i cannot login successfully so if u fix then plz post it for me : )[/quote]Epic bump.

Read full topic

item.title: Linux

item.description:
@slick wrote:

yes sir, heres mine juss change path for compiler and run : )
my compile.sh:

/home/slick/Desktop/jdk1.6.0_11/bin/javac -cp . *.java

a note for the compiler: i have jdk as u can see!
my run.sh:

/home/slick/Desktop/jdk1.6.0_11/bin/java -Xm512M server

however i cannot login successfully so if u fix then plz post it for me : )
and also brb shower so yea might not replay right away
